017package org.apache.juneau.bean.jsonschema;
018
019/**
020 * Convenience class for representing a property that's an array of simple types.
021 *
022 * <p>
023 * An instance of this object is equivalent to calling...
024 *
025 * <p class='bjava'>
026 *    JsonSchemaProperty <jv>property</jv> = <jk>new</jk> JsonSchemaProperty(<jv>name</jv>)
027 *       .setType(JsonType.<jsf>ARRAY</jsf>)
028 *       .setItems(
029 *          <jk>new</jk> JsonSchema().setType(<jv>elementType</jv>)
030 *       );
031 * </p>
032 */
033public class JsonSchemaPropertySimpleArray extends JsonSchemaProperty {
034
035   /**
036    * Constructor.
037    *
038    * @param name The name of the schema property.
039    * @param elementType The JSON type of the elements in the array.
040    */
041   public JsonSchemaPropertySimpleArray(String name, JsonType elementType) {
042      setName(name);
043      setType(JsonType.ARRAY);
044      setItems(
045         new JsonSchema().setType(elementType)
046      );
047   }
048}
